## IPostProcessFragmentContext interface

Argument to the postProcessCodeFragment hook for the current execution context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPostProcessFragmentContext
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                    | Modifiers | Type                                    | Description                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [compilation](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.ipostprocessfragmentcontext.compilation.md) |           | webpack.compilation.Compilation         | The current webpack compilation, for error reporting                                                     |
| [loggingName](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.ipostprocessfragmentcontext.loggingname.md) |           | string                                  | A name to use for logging                                                                                |
| [module](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.ipostprocessfragmentcontext.module.md)           |           | webpack.compilation.Module \| undefined | The current module being processed, or <code>undefined</code> if not in a module (e.g. the bootstrapper) |
